entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Whitecourt
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:26 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -25.4°C

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 15.
